translations:
proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<forall>nP G.
       sinvar G nP = (\<forall>(e1, e2)\<in>edges G. ?P e1 e2 nP G)
 2. \<forall>nP e1 e2 N E' E.
       wf_graph \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr> \<and>
       (e1, e2) \<in> E \<and>
       E' \<subseteq> E \<and>
       ?P e1 e2 nP \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr> \<longrightarrow>
       ?P e1 e2 nP \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E'\<rparr>

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>nP e1 e2 N E' a b E.
       \<lbrakk>(a, b) \<in> E';
        wf_graph \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr>; (e1, e2) \<in> E;
        E' \<subseteq> E;
        \<forall>x\<in>E.
           case x of
           (e1, e2) \<Rightarrow>
             num_reachable_norefl \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr> e1
             \<le> nP e1\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> num_reachable_norefl
                          \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E'\<rparr> a
                         \<le> nP a
apply(rename_tac nP e1 e2 N E' e1' e2' E)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>nP e1 e2 N E' e1' e2' E.
       \<lbrakk>(e1', e2') \<in> E';
        wf_graph \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr>; (e1, e2) \<in> E;
        E' \<subseteq> E;
        \<forall>x\<in>E.
           case x of
           (e1, e2) \<Rightarrow>
             num_reachable_norefl \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr> e1
             \<le> nP e1\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> num_reachable_norefl
                          \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E'\<rparr> e1'
                         \<le> nP e1'
apply(drule_tac E'="E'" and v="e1'" in num_reachable_norefl_mono)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>nP e1 e2 N E' e1' e2' E.
       \<lbrakk>(e1', e2') \<in> E'; (e1, e2) \<in> E; E' \<subseteq> E;
        \<forall>x\<in>E.
           case x of
           (e1, e2) \<Rightarrow>
             num_reachable_norefl \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr> e1
             \<le> nP e1\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> E' \<subseteq> E
 2. \<And>nP e1 e2 N E' e1' e2' E.
       \<lbrakk>(e1', e2') \<in> E'; (e1, e2) \<in> E; E' \<subseteq> E;
        \<forall>x\<in>E.
           case x of
           (e1, e2) \<Rightarrow>
             num_reachable_norefl \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr> e1
             \<le> nP e1;
        num_reachable_norefl \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E'\<rparr> e1'
        \<le> num_reachable_norefl \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr>
               e1'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> num_reachable_norefl
                          \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E'\<rparr> e1'
                         \<le> nP e1'

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>nP e1 e2 N E' e1' e2' E.
       \<lbrakk>(e1', e2') \<in> E'; (e1, e2) \<in> E; E' \<subseteq> E;
        \<forall>x\<in>E.
           case x of
           (e1, e2) \<Rightarrow>
             num_reachable_norefl \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr> e1
             \<le> nP e1;
        num_reachable_norefl \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E'\<rparr> e1'
        \<le> num_reachable_norefl \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr>
               e1'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> num_reachable_norefl
                          \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E'\<rparr> e1'
                         \<le> nP e1'

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>nP e1 e2 N E' e1' e2' E.
       \<lbrakk>(e1', e2') \<in> E'; (e1, e2) \<in> E; E' \<subseteq> E;
        \<forall>x\<in>E.
           case x of
           (e1, e2) \<Rightarrow>
             num_reachable_norefl \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr> e1
             \<le> nP e1;
        num_reachable_norefl \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E'\<rparr> e1'
        \<le> num_reachable_norefl \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr> e1';
        (e1', e2') \<in> E\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> num_reachable_norefl
                          \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E'\<rparr> e1'
                         \<le> nP e1'
 2. \<And>nP e1 e2 N E' e1' e2' E.
       \<lbrakk>(e1', e2') \<in> E'; (e1, e2) \<in> E; E' \<subseteq> E;
        \<forall>x\<in>E.
           case x of
           (e1, e2) \<Rightarrow>
             num_reachable_norefl \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr> e1
             \<le> nP e1;
        num_reachable_norefl \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E'\<rparr> e1'
        \<le> num_reachable_norefl \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr>
               e1'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (e1', e2') \<in> E

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>nP e1 e2 N E' e1' e2' E.
       \<lbrakk>(e1', e2') \<in> E'; (e1, e2) \<in> E; E' \<subseteq> E;
        \<forall>x\<in>E.
           case x of
           (e1, e2) \<Rightarrow>
             num_reachable_norefl \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr> e1
             \<le> nP e1;
        num_reachable_norefl \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E'\<rparr> e1'
        \<le> num_reachable_norefl \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr>
               e1'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (e1', e2') \<in> E

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>G nP.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G; \<not> sinvar G nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.set_offending_flows
                          sinvar G nP \<noteq>
                         {}
 2. \<And>N E E' nP.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr>;
        E' \<subseteq> E;
        sinvar \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr> nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> sinvar \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E'\<rparr> nP
 3. \<And>G ff nP f'.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G;
        SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows sinvar ff G
         nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows
                          sinvar (ff \<union> f') G nP

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>G nP.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G; \<not> sinvar G nP;
        \<exists>xs. set xs = edges G \<and> distinct xs\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.set_offending_flows
                          sinvar G nP \<noteq>
                         {}
 2. \<And>N E E' nP.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr>;
        E' \<subseteq> E;
        sinvar \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr> nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> sinvar \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E'\<rparr> nP
 3. \<And>G ff nP f'.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G;
        SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows sinvar ff G
         nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows
                          sinvar (ff \<union> f') G nP

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>G nP xs.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G; \<not> sinvar G nP;
        set xs = edges G \<and> distinct xs\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.set_offending_flows

 2. \<And>N E E' nP.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr>;
        E' \<subseteq> E;
        sinvar \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr> nP\<rbrakk>

 3. \<And>G ff nP f'.

       \<Longrightarrow> SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>G nP list_edges.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G; \<not> sinvar G nP;
        set list_edges = edges G \<and> distinct list_edges\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.set_offending_flows
                          sinvar G nP \<noteq>
                         {}
 2. \<And>N E E' nP.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr>;
        E' \<subseteq> E;
        sinvar \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr> nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> sinvar \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E'\<rparr> nP
 3. \<And>G ff nP f'.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G;
        SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows sinvar ff G
         nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows
                          sinvar (ff \<union> f') G nP

proof (prove)
goal (6 subgoals):
 1. \<And>G nP list_edges.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G; \<not> sinvar G nP;
        set list_edges = edges G \<and> distinct list_edges\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> wf_graph G
 2. \<And>G nP list_edges.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G; \<not> sinvar G nP;
        set list_edges = edges G \<and> distinct list_edges\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows
                          sinvar (set list_edges) G nP
 3. \<And>G nP list_edges.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G; \<not> sinvar G nP;
        set list_edges = edges G \<and> distinct list_edges\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> set list_edges \<subseteq> edges G
 4. \<And>G nP list_edges.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G; \<not> sinvar G nP;
        set list_edges = edges G \<and> distinct list_edges\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> distinct list_edges
 5. \<And>N E E' nP.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr>;
        E' \<subseteq> E;
        sinvar \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr> nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> sinvar \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E'\<rparr> nP
 6. \<And>G ff nP f'.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G;
        SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows sinvar ff G
         nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows
                          sinvar (ff \<union> f') G nP

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>G nP list_edges a b.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G; (a, b) \<in> edges G;
        \<not> num_reachable_norefl G a \<le> nP a;
        set list_edges = edges G; distinct list_edges\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows
                          sinvar (edges G) G nP
 2. \<And>N E E' nP.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr>;
        E' \<subseteq> E;
        sinvar \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr> nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> sinvar \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E'\<rparr> nP
 3. \<And>G ff nP f'.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G;
        SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows sinvar ff G
         nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows
                          sinvar (ff \<union> f') G nP

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>N E E' nP.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr>;
        E' \<subseteq> E;
        sinvar \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E\<rparr> nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> sinvar \<lparr>nodes = N, edges = E'\<rparr> nP
 2. \<And>G ff nP f'.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G;
        SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows sinvar ff G
         nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows
                          sinvar (ff \<union> f') G nP

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>G ff nP f'.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G;
        SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows sinvar ff G
         nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows.is_offending_flows
                          sinvar (ff \<union> f') G nP

interpretation Dependability: SecurityInvariant_ACS
where default_node_properties = SINVAR_Dependability_norefl.default_node_properties
and sinvar = SINVAR_Dependability_norefl.sinvar

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. SecurityInvariant_ACS sinvar default_node_properties

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>G f nP.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G; f \<in> set_offending_flows G nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<forall>i\<in>fst ` f.
                            \<not> sinvar G (nP(i := 0))
 2. \<And>otherbot.
       \<forall>G f nP i.
          wf_graph G \<and>
          f \<in> set_offending_flows G nP \<and>
          i \<in> fst ` f \<longrightarrow>
          \<not> sinvar G (nP(i := otherbot)) \<Longrightarrow>
       otherbot = 0
fix G::"'a graph" and f nP

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>G f nP.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G; f \<in> set_offending_flows G nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<forall>i\<in>fst ` f.
                            \<not> sinvar G (nP(i := 0))
 2. \<And>otherbot.
       \<forall>G f nP i.
          wf_graph G \<and>
          f \<in> set_offending_flows G nP \<and>
          i \<in> fst ` f \<longrightarrow>
          \<not> sinvar G (nP(i := otherbot)) \<Longrightarrow>
       otherbot = 0
assume "wf_graph G" and "f \<in> set_offending_flows G nP"

proof (state)
this:
  wf_graph G
  f \<in> set_offending_flows G nP

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>G f nP.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G; f \<in> set_offending_flows G nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<forall>i\<in>fst ` f.
                            \<not> sinvar G (nP(i := 0))
 2. \<And>otherbot.
       \<forall>G f nP i.
          wf_graph G \<and>
          f \<in> set_offending_flows G nP \<and>
          i \<in> fst ` f \<longrightarrow>
          \<not> sinvar G (nP(i := otherbot)) \<Longrightarrow>
       otherbot = 0

proof (prove)
using this:
  wf_graph G
  f \<in> set_offending_flows G nP

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>i\<in>fst ` f. \<not> sinvar G (nP(i := 0))

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>wf_graph G;
     f \<subseteq> edges G \<and>
     (\<exists>x\<in>edges G.
         \<not> (case x of
                 (e1, e2) \<Rightarrow>
                   num_reachable_norefl G e1 \<le> nP e1)) \<and>
     (\<forall>x\<in>edges (delete_edges G f).
         case x of
         (e1, e2) \<Rightarrow>
           num_reachable_norefl (delete_edges G f) e1 \<le> nP e1) \<and>
     (\<forall>x\<in>f.
         case x of
         (e1, e2) \<Rightarrow>
           \<exists>x\<in>edges (add_edge e1 e2 (delete_edges G f)).
              \<not> (case x of
                      (e1a, e2a) \<Rightarrow>
                        num_reachable_norefl
                         (add_edge e1 e2 (delete_edges G f)) e1a
                        \<le> nP e1a))\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> \<forall>i\<in>f.
                         \<exists>x\<in>edges G.
                            \<not> (case x of
                                    (e1, e2) \<Rightarrow>
num_reachable_norefl G e1 \<le> (if e1 = fst i then 0 else nP e1))

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<forall>x\<in>f.
                \<forall>x1 x2.
                   x = (x1, x2) \<longrightarrow>
                   (\<exists>x\<in>edges
                                    (add_edge x1 x2 (delete_edges G f)).
                       \<forall>x1a.
                          (\<forall>x2. x \<noteq> (x1a, x2)) \<or>
                          \<not> num_reachable_norefl
                                  (add_edge x1 x2 (delete_edges G f)) x1a
                                 \<le> nP x1a);
     wf_graph G; f \<subseteq> edges G;
     \<exists>x\<in>edges G.
        \<forall>x1.
           (\<forall>x2. x \<noteq> (x1, x2)) \<or>
           \<not> num_reachable_norefl G x1 \<le> nP x1;
     \<forall>x\<in>edges (delete_edges G f).
        \<forall>x1.
           (\<forall>x2. x \<noteq> (x1, x2)) \<or>
           num_reachable_norefl (delete_edges G f) x1 \<le> nP x1\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> \<forall>i\<in>f.
                         \<exists>x\<in>edges G.
                            \<forall>x1.
                               (x1 = fst i \<longrightarrow>
                                (\<exists>x2.
                                    x = (fst i, x2)) \<longrightarrow>
                                0 < num_reachable_norefl G (fst i)) \<and>
                               (x1 \<noteq> fst i \<longrightarrow>
                                (\<exists>x2.
                                    x = (x1, x2)) \<longrightarrow>
                                \<not> num_reachable_norefl G x1
 \<le> nP x1)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<forall>x\<in>f.
                \<forall>x1 x2.
                   x = (x1, x2) \<longrightarrow>
                   num_reachable_norefl
                    \<lparr>nodes = insert x1 (insert x2 (nodes G)),
                       edges = insert (x1, x2) (edges G - f)\<rparr>
                    x1
                   \<le> nP x1 \<longrightarrow>
                   (\<exists>x\<in>edges G - f.
                       \<forall>x1a.
                          (\<forall>x2. x \<noteq> (x1a, x2)) \<or>
                          \<not> num_reachable_norefl
                                  \<lparr>nodes =
      insert x1 (insert x2 (nodes G)),
                                     edges =
 insert (x1, x2) (edges G - f)\<rparr>
                                  x1a
                                 \<le> nP x1a);
     wf_graph G; f \<subseteq> edges G;
     \<exists>x\<in>edges G.
        \<forall>x1.
           (\<forall>x2. x \<noteq> (x1, x2)) \<or>
           \<not> num_reachable_norefl G x1 \<le> nP x1;
     \<forall>x\<in>edges G - f.
        \<forall>x1.
           (\<forall>x2. x \<noteq> (x1, x2)) \<or>
           num_reachable_norefl
            \<lparr>nodes = nodes G, edges = edges G - f\<rparr> x1
           \<le> nP x1\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> \<forall>i\<in>f.
                         \<exists>x\<in>edges G.
                            \<forall>x1.
                               (x1 = fst i \<longrightarrow>
                                (\<exists>x2.
                                    x = (fst i, x2)) \<longrightarrow>
                                0 < num_reachable_norefl G (fst i)) \<and>
                               (x1 \<noteq> fst i \<longrightarrow>
                                (\<exists>x2.
                                    x = (x1, x2)) \<longrightarrow>
                                \<not> num_reachable_norefl G x1
 \<le> nP x1)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a b aa ba.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x\<in>f.
                   \<forall>x1 x2.
                      x = (x1, x2) \<longrightarrow>
                      num_reachable_norefl
                       \<lparr>nodes = insert x1 (insert x2 (nodes G)),
                          edges = insert (x1, x2) (edges G - f)\<rparr>
                       x1
                      \<le> nP x1 \<longrightarrow>
                      (\<exists>x\<in>edges G - f.
                          \<forall>x1a.
                             (\<forall>x2. x \<noteq> (x1a, x2)) \<or>
                             \<not> num_reachable_norefl
                                     \<lparr>nodes =
         insert x1 (insert x2 (nodes G)),
  edges = insert (x1, x2) (edges G - f)\<rparr>
                                     x1a
                                    \<le> nP x1a);
        wf_graph G; f \<subseteq> edges G;
        \<forall>x\<in>edges G - f.
           \<forall>x1.
              (\<forall>x2. x \<noteq> (x1, x2)) \<or>
              num_reachable_norefl
               \<lparr>nodes = nodes G, edges = edges G - f\<rparr> x1
              \<le> nP x1;
        (a, b) \<in> edges G;
        \<forall>x1.
           (\<forall>x2. (a, b) \<noteq> (x1, x2)) \<or>
           \<not> num_reachable_norefl G x1 \<le> nP x1;
        (aa, ba) \<in> f\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>x\<in>edges G.
                            \<forall>x1.
                               (x1 = fst (aa, ba) \<longrightarrow>
                                (\<exists>x2.
                                    x =
                                    (fst (aa, ba), x2)) \<longrightarrow>
                                0 < num_reachable_norefl G
                                     (fst (aa, ba))) \<and>
                               (x1 \<noteq> fst (aa, ba) \<longrightarrow>
                                (\<exists>x2.
                                    x = (x1, x2)) \<longrightarrow>
                                \<not> num_reachable_norefl G x1
 \<le> nP x1)

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>i\<in>fst ` f. \<not> sinvar G (nP(i := 0))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>otherbot.
       \<forall>G f nP i.
          wf_graph G \<and>
          f \<in> set_offending_flows G nP \<and>
          i \<in> fst ` f \<longrightarrow>
          \<not> sinvar G (nP(i := otherbot)) \<Longrightarrow>
       otherbot = 0

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>otherbot.
       \<forall>G f nP i.
          wf_graph G \<and>
          f \<in> set_offending_flows G nP \<and>
          i \<in> fst ` f \<longrightarrow>
          \<not> sinvar G (nP(i := otherbot)) \<Longrightarrow>
       otherbot = 0

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>otherbot.
       \<forall>G f nP i.
          wf_graph G \<and>
          f \<in> set_offending_flows G nP \<and>
          i \<in> fst ` f \<longrightarrow>
          \<not> sinvar G (nP(i := otherbot)) \<Longrightarrow>
       otherbot = 0
assume assm: "\<forall>G f nP i. wf_graph G \<and> f \<in> set_offending_flows G nP \<and> i \<in> fst ` f \<longrightarrow> \<not> sinvar G (nP(i := otherbot))"

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>G f nP i.
     wf_graph G \<and>
     f \<in> set_offending_flows G nP \<and>
     i \<in> fst ` f \<longrightarrow>
     \<not> sinvar G (nP(i := otherbot))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>otherbot.
       \<forall>G f nP i.
          wf_graph G \<and>
          f \<in> set_offending_flows G nP \<and>
          i \<in> fst ` f \<longrightarrow>
          \<not> sinvar G (nP(i := otherbot)) \<Longrightarrow>
       otherbot = 0

    \<exists>G nP i f.
       wf_graph G \<and>
       \<not> sinvar G nP \<and>

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. 0 < otherbot \<Longrightarrow>
    \<exists>G.
       wf_graph G \<and>
       (\<exists>nP.
           (\<exists>x\<in>edges G.
               \<not> (case x of
                       (e1, e2) \<Rightarrow>
                         num_reachable_norefl G e1 \<le> nP e1)) \<and>
           (\<exists>i f.
               f \<in> set_offending_flows G nP \<and>
               (\<forall>x\<in>edges (delete_edges G f).
                   case x of
                   (e1, e2) \<Rightarrow>
                     num_reachable_norefl (delete_edges G f) e1
                     \<le> nP e1) \<and>
               i \<in> fst ` f \<and>
               (\<forall>x\<in>edges G.
                   case x of
                   (e1, e2) \<Rightarrow>
                     num_reachable_norefl G e1
                     \<le> (if e1 = i then otherbot else nP e1))))

                   \<exists>x\<in>edges (add_edge e1 e2 (delete_edges G f)).
                      \<not> (case x of

                                 (add_edge e1 e2 (delete_edges G f)) e1a
                                \<le> nP e1a)) \<and>
               (\<forall>(e1, e2)\<in>edges (delete_edges G f).

                             \<not> num_reachable_norefl
                                     \<lparr>nodes =
         insert x1 (insert x2 (nodes G)),
  edges = insert (x1, x2) (edges G - f)\<rparr>
                                     x1a

               (\<forall>x\<in>edges G - f.

                      num_reachable_norefl
                       \<lparr>nodes = nodes G, edges = edges G - f\<rparr>
                       x1
                      \<le> nP x1) \<and>
               i \<in> fst ` f \<and>
               (\<forall>x\<in>edges G.

                      (x1 \<noteq> i \<longrightarrow>
